com.group10b.blueka.Operation

Class OperationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group10b.blueka.Operation.OperationManager

  • public class OperationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Manager of all operations, this will be used by the advertiser and scanner for to operated their operations sequentially. It contains an queue to make the operations work in a sequence.

      • operationCompleted

        public void operationCompleted()
        To tell the Manager the operation has completed. The Manager will dequeue the next operation to execute.
